title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Private and secure web browser-based access to your data in S3 (STG220)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 通过基于Web浏览器的私有安全访问方式访问S3中的数据 (STG220)
abstract: Learn how AWS Transfer Family web apps provide a no-code, fully managed solution that enables non-technical users to securely access and share data stored in Amazon S3. We'll explore how this browser-based interface simplifies file transfers for your workforce, partners, and customers—no client software required. We'll also highlight our newest feature: VPC endpoint support for private access, further enhancing security controls. Whether you're modernizing legacy file transfer systems, centralizing data sharing across your organization, or building secure collaboration workflows with external partners, you'll learn how Transfer Family web apps can simplify secure file access while maintaining enterprise-grade security.
abstract_cn: 了解 AWS Transfer Family Web 应用程序如何提供无代码、完全托管的解决方案，使非技术用户能够安全地访问和共享存储在 Amazon S3 中的数据。我们将探讨这个基于浏览器的界面如何为您的员工、合作伙伴和客户简化文件传输——无需客户端软件。我们还将重点介绍我们的最新功能：VPC 终端节点支持私有访问，进一步增强安全控制。无论您是在现代化传统文件传输系统、集中组织内的数据共享，还是与外部合作伙伴构建安全的协作工作流程，您都将了解 Transfer Family Web 应用程序如何在保持企业级安全性的同时简化安全文件访问。
